availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, Steamboat engineer. Kentucky native. Married to Anna Levi. Father of Blanche Levi and Lillie Levi.

bibl.p:
KYR-0001-004-0131.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 8, p. 120.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, 11th Ward, p. 265.
Find A Grave, "Willis Levi, Jr (1836-1909)," Memorial #104234952
, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=104234952&ref=acom (accessed August, 7, 2017).
